name: Whale Wars #IWantToCreate
description:
EDIT: Thank you Clickteam for helping me out with this and providing me with the .exe <3 Very appreciated!

EDIT2: Whoops, make sure to don't die when you're on the right as when you do, I never reset the Whale's position apparently... I never realised this could happen. :(

Created for the #IWantToCreate Contest

Made with the free version of Clickteam Fusion 2.5 as an experiment to see if I could still make something fun with all the limitations it has. Unfortunately, I unexpectedly ran into the event limit and was forced to scrap a few thing.

It has 2 levels and it's a pretty silly game but hopefully with fun gameplay. :)
